resources.string: This Activity displays the Artists details and Songs from this Artist
The Songs view has the playlist stored for the user and can be played

In the Browse Activity the music is categorized into Charts, Genres & Moods, New Releases, Discover and Concerts. Once a particular song is selected you can play it by clicking "PLAY" button. The "HOME" button takes you back to the main screen.The + button adds the selected song to your saved list and changes to songs activity
The Radio Activity will display different Genre Stations like Blues, Christian, Classical, etc. and also artist specific Internet Radio Stations streaming music.
In the play activity, the song is played using Android music player API
